text: Kathryn Robinson (born April 8, 1985) is a Canadian equestrian who competes in the sport of eventing.COC ProfileFei profile Robinson won a bronze medal as part of the Canadian eventing team at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto.Silver for Jessica Phoenix, Bronze for Canadian Eventing Team at the Toronto 2015 Pan Am Games In July 2016, she was named to Canada's Olympic team, as a replacement for Selena O'Hanlon. At the Games held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Robinson placed 10th in the team competition and was eliminated from the individual event during the cross-country stage after incurring three refusals. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female equestrians Category:Canadian sportswomen Category:Equestrians at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Sportspeople from Kettering Category:Equestrians at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian
title: Kathryn Robinson (equestrian)
